mapper.sql:
a.id AS "goodsId", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_no AS "goodsNo", a.goods_status AS "goodsStatus",
(case when gcd.channel_id is null then 2 else 1 end ) AS "assigned", #{channelId} AS "channelId"
left join goods_channel_dtl gcd on gcd.goods_id = a.id and gcd.channel_id = #{channelId} left join goods_channel gc on gc.id = gcd.channel_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM goods a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.merchant_id=0
and 1=1
and (a.id in (select goods_id from goods_channel_dtl where channel_id = #{channelId}))
and (a.id not in (select goods_id from goods_channel_dtl where channel_id = #{channelId}))
and 1=2
AND a.category_id = #{goodsCategoryId}
AND a.goods_name LIKE concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
AND a.goods_no LIKE concat('%',#{goodsNo},'%')
AND a.goods_status = #{goodsStatus}
AND a.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY assigned ASC,a.update_date DESC
